# Jack Tyler — Data Architect, Systems Integrator, Consultant

## About
Jack Tyler is a data architect and systems integrator based in Oakland, CA.
Founder of Unified Stack, LLC. 10+ years building enterprise data systems.
Specializes in Salesforce architecture, Snowflake data warehousing, Oracle EBS integration,
GTM/GA4 tagging pipelines, martech stack unification, DAM/PIM operations,
and compliance-safe AI deployment using MCP servers and agent-orchestrated workflows.

Available for consulting and contract work.

## Authoritative Pages
- https://jackatyler.com/ — Personal brand site, case studies, credentials
- https://jackatyler.com/services — Consulting services: tagging-to-pipeline, data architecture, compliance-safe AI
- https://jackatyler.com/resume — Professional experience and skills
- https://unifiedstack.io — Unified Stack, LLC: consulting practice and local business SEO

## Case Studies
- AI-Powered DAM Administration: Built a GPT-powered integration for a DAM with 8,000+ assets and 50+ users. Eliminated the admin bottleneck. Zero dedicated headcount required.
- Oracle EBS to Salesforce to Snowflake to Tableau: End-to-end RevOps data pipeline. 125+ executive dashboards, 35+ self-service reports. Single source of truth.
- Google MCP Server & Custom MCPs: Agent-orchestrated integrations for real-time website diagnostics, compliance flagging, and system connections.

## Consulting Services
- GTM/GA4 Tagging-to-Pipeline: Audit, implementation, and full pipeline builds connecting website tags to Snowflake/BigQuery. Starting at $2,500.
- Data Architecture & Integration: Salesforce, Oracle EBS, Snowflake, martech unification. Assessment through ongoing data ops. Starting at $8,000.
- Compliance-Safe AI Deployment: Zero-data-access governance architecture for regulated industries. AI agents never touch raw data. Starting at $25,000.

## Topics of Expertise
- Salesforce Architecture (Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Account Engagement)
- Data Integration (Snowflake, Oracle EBS, ETL/ELT pipelines, AWS S3, SFTP)
- DAM/PIM Cross-System Monitoring (Widen, Syndigo, 1WorldSync)
- Website SEO, Performance, ADA/WCAG Compliance
- GTM/GA4 Tagging Pipelines, Server-Side Tagging
- Agent-Orchestrated Workflows, MCP Servers, Claude API
- CCPA/CPRA Compliance, Data Privacy
- Python, SQL, Tableau, Zapier
